text: phwk khea chxb hakwa phwk cea ca ptiseth sraththa dang thi phwk khea di ptiseth phwk cea ca di klay pen phu thi theatheiym kan dangnan cng xya di yud xea khır nı hmu phwk khea pen mitr cnkwa phwk khea ca xphyph pi nı thang khx ngxallxhˌ tæ tha phwk khea phinhlanghı k cng xea phwk khea wi læa cng kha phwk khea n thi thi phwk cea phb phwk khea læa cng xya xea khır nı hmu phwk khea pen mitr læa pen phu chwyhelux
